data.text: I love bringing new characters to life, but I recently got to explore doing it using drawing and animation. To watch my learning experience with @skillshare (and get 2 weeks free), use this link: https://t.co/TL7JwFE6Pm #ad @skillshare @jonburgerman https://t.co/gCsCoUd2vu

Proud to be a co-chair of the @godslovenyc #GoldenHeartAwards tonight. A great cause this #givingtuesday @michaelkors  Can’t attend virtually? Bid on a chance to win a restaurant buyout dinner with me & @Davidburtka at Carbone restaurant! https://t.co/3O82Lt6sTx
Thanksgiving realness in the all-new #NissanRogue2021 #ad @NissanUSA https://t.co/hTKmS3PQA4

Well @Davidburtka and I were quite flattered to be part of @people Magazine’s Sexiest Man Alive issue, aaaand then we realized they just wanted us for our our dogs...  Stings, but still worth it.  https://t.co/vMwQezZCA4

Beyond excited to begin reading the new book by @AnthonyHorowitz, Moonflower Murders. It’s predecessor, Magpie Murders, is one of my favorite books ever. Cannn’t waaaait. #murdermystery https://t.co/ewhNfxB2Tv
To all of our veterans and current military members, those who represent our country and put their lives on the line, every day - thank you. I salute you. #VeteransDay2020

I’m a fan of @chrisramsay52 and share his love of puzzles, magic, and escape-y things. Had a legit good time being interviewed on his YT channel about my new game, Box ONE (though it was a tad frustrating at the end). Check it out: https://t.co/bV4qyx3osp

Congratulations to my friends at @NTScontractors. Your constant hard work has paid off yet again: another project featured on the cover of Architectural Digest, five years after ours! Keep it up! #proud https://t.co/4QimynJQZY
Be you. Be proud. #NationalComingOutDay ❤️@Davidburtka https://t.co/23lF8qcvCU
These will now become my go to restaurants when the covid has lifted. Well done #nizzanyc & #marseillenyc really well done. #TogetherStronger https://t.co/66NEcORzh0
Is it a seance? A puzzle box? Something that will now reside in my house? I have no idea what’s in this terrifying box! But I’m getting one... Join me? https://t.co/Jn3QwnYIxR https://t.co/8uKChoFiI3
Not out juuuust yet. 10/4 is the shelf date at @Target. For those that don’t know: Box One - a party game for just one - will be awesome. https://t.co/SuyAednV8J https://t.co/PK2V0EYvMn

Loving the podcast @FinishItPod. Two brothers hilariously discuss every single option in Choose Your Own Adventure books from the ‘80s. A wonderful listen. I’m digging Who Killed Harlowe Thromby. https://t.co/atLwWdOUhP
Tim, stop with the inspiration. You’re making my exercise regime pale in comparison, and I’m already pale enough..! @tim_cook https://t.co/ieK34VMLrD
Virtual book tour tonight, in a few hours! It’s on Zoom, so we can see each other, chat, I’ll answer your questions, it’ll be...magic. Come play! https://t.co/HsqkkOoslh https://t.co/DR72s41QXP

Magic Misfits: the Fourth Suit comes out TOMORROW! It’s the final book in the series. The concluding course in the meal. The last piece in the quadriptych. The terminal stop on the train. The end, um, thing in the thing. Buy a copy now! https://t.co/XeUASJx55B #themagicmisfits
Won’t forget. Sending love and prayers. https://t.co/F6uqNj0x8o

Hey! I’ve got two virtual book tour events next week. No local gathering for a few, let’s have LOTS of people all hanging out, Zoom-style. We’ll chat, answer question, learn magic. I’m in. Are you? (Link in bio) @bluewillowbooks @unlikelybkstore @littlebrownyr #themagicmisfits https://t.co/54owueK5TM

So I’m wanting to improve/upgrade my workshop/tinker shed. Is one tool brand better than another? @DEWALTtough ? @MakitaTools ? @RYOBItoolsusa ?  @BoschGlobal ? All the tools share batteries, so I kind if need to commit to one, no? #help
Happy Labor Day! To all of those who work so tirelessly, keeping our country going - a thousand thanks. I salute and appreciate you.

What could go wrong? One of my favorite shows from across the pond is coming to the US, Canada, New Zealand and Australia this Saturday! Check out #GoesWrongShow on @AmazonPrimeVideo, courtesy of @MischiefComedy, @bigtalk and @LionsgateTV. https://t.co/M4u57GEhcJ

James Carpinello and Amy Acker - two of the most talented, smartest, best people in the world - wrote, produced, directed and SHOT a short film, entirely on an iPhone, at home while isolated. It’s great. So proud of them. @TheJimmyCarp @AmyAcker OUTSIDE: https://t.co/UUEV7hY6Lk
A smart call, @GovMLG. Thanks for considering. Good on ya @Pharrell https://t.co/Yx6K2c234W
Best birthday present ever. https://t.co/6LCDYzlQ1n

Honored to highlight my friends @greengoohelps donating much-needed #HandSanitizer to orgs fighting #COVID19 + aiding those affected. They #SpreadGoodness & you can too! They're giving 1% of sanitizer sales to important charities monthly. Get some: https://t.co/gqASe1raR9 https://t.co/BgkoBsat4B

Proud to see @OldNavy stepping up to put family first. Today, they’re donating $30 million of clothing to help families in need, all across America. They’re celebrating with artist @noahscalin, who put a pretty unique twist on the typical family portrait. #partner https://t.co/hb6qCEmvWe

Watching #AndrewScott in the exquisite @StephensSimon piece Sea Wall is nothing short of astonishing. Nuanced, hypnotic, heart wrenching perfection. Holy hell. Andrew Scott is SO GOOD. I’m both wildly inspired and utterly deflated. 30 minute must-watch. https://t.co/5obRKxjHR1

Join us TODAY at 2:30pm for a pre 5/5 Mexican Fiesta! @Davidburtka and I are launching #NYCWFF’s virtual cooking class series - we'll make margaritas, guacamole & nacho burritos. Proceeds benefit NY restaurant workers affected by COVID-19. Tix are $20 at https://t.co/FKQcGzLEZO https://t.co/wLe7JU1kPo
Sondheim fans, new link: https://t.co/74o5XOUiVW

The new iPhone SE (PRODUCT) @RED is here! Right now all proceeds will go to @GlobalFund’s newly established COVID-19 response which provides support to health systems most threatened by the pandemic, and also preserves lifesaving HIV/AIDS programs. #partner #redisrad https://t.co/FfIPkZvnI7

Had fun sitting down with Charlie Melcher for the new episode of the Future of StoryTelling podcast! We talked about everything from immersive theater to the lessons I learned during my days as an amateur trapeze artist. https://t.co/QjWOfgX3cC

If you miss watching circus performers doing their awesome circus skills as much as I do, then tune in at https://t.co/UChyjlmJ4T or on Youtube directly for their new video premiering tomorrow 3pm EST time.
 https://t.co/zq2Xcgote6 #StayHome   #CirqueConnect #TogetherAtHome

Bravo to my friends at @nts_contractors who have sourced and distributed over 12,000 surgical-style masks to hospitals and health care facilities throughout NYC. Help them raise funds for more masks to keep these heroes safe as they serve those in need: https://t.co/kcRx82eQo9 https://t.co/oAkn7FiDvn

Bravo @Lin_Manuel and TeeRico for their efforts to raise much-needed funds for @BCEFA and their Covid-19 Emergency Fund. 
The team has designed a special sweatshirt featuring Broadway's zipcode with kisses on the elbows. 100% of proceeds benefit the cause: https://t.co/mWYJu5YIyn https://t.co/4jZERBV3GQ

If you’re into escape rooms and/or tabletop role playing and/or podcasts, give a listen to the awesome @EscThisPodcast. This week’s episode features myself and friend Brent Bushnell from the brilliant @TwoBitCircus traveling thru time! Super fun. Listen: https://t.co/XWguXq8tEu
Proud of this documentary. Proud of the Magic Castle. Can’t wait for it to get distribution and be seen by everyone. #keepthemagicalive @MagicCastle_AMA https://t.co/BUr1rYrSqd

Oh my god. Just reading that Adam Schlesinger passed away from Coronavirus complications. A brilliant musician and writer, we shared many award show moments together. He was so kind. Gone too soon. I’m reeling. My thoughts and prayers go out to his family. https://t.co/zvGgzSjiJ9

During this crisis, our grocery store clerks, delivery drivers, transit and utility workers—along with so many others—have been selflessly getting up every day to make sure we have the things we need. And for that, we say thank you.
https://t.co/Fq5qIRXt03

I keep opening Twitter to type something, then not knowing what to say. Blithe or innocuous feels disrespectful, give all that is happening to so many. But warnings or solemnity just seem dire and redundant. I’m at a loss...
Our family rented the movie Cats last night. For $20. Meow-ch.

Looking forward to joining the fun tonight for a one night only @rosie show to support the wonderful @theactorsfund and help one of many industries in need. The event streams live at 7pm ET, 4pm PT on @broadwaycom and https://t.co/n5TUPKKJtQ https://t.co/OTNCxylahd
